verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5023><s%> I looked, <S%G1492><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a door <S%G2374><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%> in heaven: <S%G3772><s%> and the first <S%G4413><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> was as it were of a trumpet <S%G4536><s%> talking <S%G2980><s%> with me; which said, <S%G3004><s%> Come <S%G305><s%> up here, <S%G5602><s%> and I will show <S%G1166><s%> you things which <S%G3739><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be hereafter. <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%>

And immediately <S%G2112><s%> I was in the spirit: <S%G4151><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a throne <S%G2362><s%> was set <S%G2749><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and one sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne. <S%G2362><s%>

And he that sat <S%G2521><s%> was to look <S%G3706><s%> on like <S%G3664><s%> a jasper <S%G2393><s%> and a sardine <S%G4555><s%> stone: <S%G3037><s%> and there was a rainbow <S%G2463><s%> round <S%G2943><s%> about <S%G2943><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> in sight <S%G3706><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> to an emerald. <S%G4664><s%>

And round <S%G2943><s%> about <S%G2943><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> were four <S%G5064><s%> and twenty <S%G1501><s%> seats: <S%G2362><s%> and on the seats <S%G2362><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> and twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> sitting, <S%G2521><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> in white <S%G3022><s%> raiment; <S%G2440><s%> and they had <S%G2192><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their heads <S%G2776><s%> crowns <S%G4735><s%> of gold. <S%G5552><s%>

And out of the throne <S%G2362><s%> proceeded <S%G1607><s%> lightning <S%G796><s%> and thunder <S%G1027><s%> and voices: <S%G5456><s%> and there were seven <S%G2033><s%> lamps <S%G2985><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> burning <S%G2545><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are the seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> there was a sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass <S%G5193><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> to crystal: <S%G2930><s%> and in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and round <S%G2943><s%> about <S%G2943><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> were four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of eyes <S%G3788><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> and behind. <S%G3693><s%>

And the first <S%G4413><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> was like <S%G3664><s%> a lion, <S%G3023><s%> and the second <S%G1208><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a calf, <S%G3448><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a face <S%G4383><s%> as a man, <S%G444><s%> and the fourth <S%G5067><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> was like <S%G3664><s%> a flying <S%G4072><s%> eagle. <S%G105><s%>

And the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> each <S%G303><s%> of them six <S%G1803><s%> wings <S%G4420><s%> about <S%G2943><s%> him; and they were full <S%G1073><s%> of eyes <S%G3788><s%> within: <S%G2081><s%> and they rest <S%G2192><s%> <S%G372><s%> not day <S%G2250><s%> and night, <S%G3571><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> holy, <S%G40><s%> holy, <S%G40><s%> LORD <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was, and is, and is to come. <S%G2064><s%>

And when <S%G3752><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and thanks <S%G2169><s%> to him that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> lives <S%G2198><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever, <S%G165><s%>

The four <S%G5064><s%> and twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> down before <S%G1799><s%> him that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> him that lives <S%G2198><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever, <S%G165><s%> and cast <S%G906><s%> their crowns <S%G4735><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

You are <S%G1488><s%> worthy, <S%G514><s%> O Lord, <S%G2962><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and power: <S%G1411><s%> for you have created <S%G2936><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, and for your pleasure <S%G2307><s%> they are and were created. <S%G2936><s%>
